property.display-name: Log Search Solr Service Logs Replication Factor
property.description: Replication factor for Service Logs Solr collection

property.display-name: Log Search Solr Audit Logs Shards
property.description: Number of shards for Audit Logs collection

property.name: logsearch.collection.audit.logs.replication.factor
property.display-name: Log Search Solr Audit Logs Replication Factor
property.description: Replication factor for Audit Logs Solr collection

property.name: logsearch.solr.collection.service.logs
property.display-name: Log Search Solr Service Logs Collection
property.description: Name for the service logs collection

property.name: logsearch.solr.collection.audit.logs
property.display-name: Log Search Solr Audit Logs Collection
property.description: Name for the audit logs collection

property.name: logsearch.service.logs.fields
property.display-name: Log Search Solr Service Logs Fields
property.description: Solr fields for service logs

property.name: logsearch.service.logs.split.interval.mins
property.display-name: Log Search Service Logs split interval
property.description: Will create multiple collections and use alias. Valid values are single,hour_week

property.name: logsearch.audit.logs.split.interval.mins
property.display-name: Log Search Audit Logs split interval
property.description: Will switch the shard after the interval specified. Valid values are none and greater than 1

property.description: Use Ranger Audit collection. This is supported only if Ranger Solr is installed in SolrCloud mode

property.name: logsearch.ranger.audit.logs.collection.name
property.display-name: Log Search Solr Ranger Audit Logs Collection
property.description: Name for the ranger audit logs collection

property.name: logsearch.logfeeder.include.default.level
property.description: Include default Log Feeder Log Levels for Log Search. Used for bootstrapping the configuration only. (levels: FATAL,ERROR,WARN,INFO,DEBUG,TRACE)

property.name: logsearch.solr.metrics.collector.hosts
property.description: Metrics collector hosts for pushing metrics by Log Search Solr

property.name: logsearch.auth.external_auth.enabled
property.description: Enable external authentication

property.name: logsearch.auth.external_auth.host_url
property.display-name: External authentication url - host and port
property.description: The host and port of the external server used to authenticate

property.name: logsearch.auth.external_auth.login_url
property.display-name: External authentication url - path and query
property.description: The path and query of the external server used to authenticate

property.name: logsearch.roles.allowed
property.description: Comma separated roles for external authentication

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.enabled
property.description: Enable JWT based authentication for Log Search portal

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.provider_url
property.description: URL to the JWT authentication server

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.query.param.original_url
property.description: Name of the original request URL which is used to redirect to Log Search Portal

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.cookie.name
property.description: The name of the cookie that contains the JWT token

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.audiances
property.description: Comma separated list of acceptable audiences for the JWT token

property.name: logsearch.auth.jwt.public_key
property.description: PEM formatted public key for JWT token without the header and the footer

property.name: logsearch.spnego.kerberos.enabled
property.description: Enable SPNEGO based authentication on the Log Search UI

property.name: logsearch.spnego.kerberos.principal
property.description: Principal for SPNEGO authentication for Http requests

property.name: logsearch.spnego.kerberos.keytab
property.description: Keytab for SPNEGO authentication for Http requests

property.name: logsearch.spnego.kerberos.host
property.description: Fully-qualified host name in the Kerberos service principal name (SPN) that is used by SPNEGO
